sentences.english: Bamboo can be made into fishing poles.
Paul took some  fishing rods, and they all went down to the  brook to fish.
sentences.chinese: 保羅拿來一些釣魚竿，他們都去小溪邊釣魚。

sentences.english: His house has a river, carrying big lazy bear came to the riverside fishing rod.
sentences.chinese: 他的屋後有一條河，大懶熊扛着魚竿來到河邊釣魚。

sentences.english: We also always get coolers and fishing rods, he said.
sentences.chinese: 我們也始終得到冷卻器和魚竿的，他說。

sentences.english: Paul took some fishing rods, and they all went down to the brook to fish.
sentences.chinese: 保羅拿來一些釣魚竿，他們都去小溪邊釣魚。

sentences.english: I rested my fishing rod against a pine bough.
sentences.chinese: 我把釣魚竿靠在一棵松樹的大樹枝上。

sentences.english: They were sitting on the dock, feet dangling in the water, Fishing poles in hand.
sentences.chinese: 他們坐在碼頭上，手裏拿着釣魚竿，腳板在水裏晃盪。

sentences.english: Firstly, we prepared some baits and then put the fishing rod in the water.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我們準備了一些魚餌，然後把魚竿在水裏。

sentences.english: The little cat saw it, put down his fishing pole, and tried to grab the dragonfly.
sentences.chinese: 小貓看見了，放下釣魚竿，就去捉蜻蜓。

sentences.english: A woman goes into Wal-Mart to buy a rod and reel.
sentences.chinese: 一個女人去沃爾瑪超市買魚竿和魚線軸。

sentences.english: IN ONE DAY SOMEBODY walked into my garage and took fishing rods and tackle.
sentences.chinese: 在一天有人走進我的車庫了釣魚竿和處理。

sentences.english: I want to go fishing today, but I have left my rod and fishing line at home.
sentences.chinese: 我今天想去釣魚，可是我把魚竿和釣魚線落在家裏了。

sentences.english: Two people hurriedly lost XiaDiao rod to save people.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人趕緊丟下釣魚竿去救人。

sentences.english: The fishing rod is made of split bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 這釣魚竿是用劈開的竹子做的。

sentences.english: The little cat saw it, put down his fishing pole and again tried to catch it.
sentences.chinese: 小貓看見了，放下釣魚竿，又去捉蝴蝶。

definition: variant of 漁網|渔网[yu2 wang3]
callus (patch or hardened skin)/corns (on feet)/also 趼子
to spin a web (spider)/to weave a net (e.g. for fishing)
